content: RE: http://www.military.com/forums/0,15240,185914,00.html I think that the CIA should not only keep striking at Pakistani-based terrorists via missile strikes but should also increase the number of attacks that it carries out. If the CIA did this, I believe that the terrorists would no longer be able to move about in Pakistan as freely as they do now.

title: CIA Chief Indicates Pakistan Strikes to Continue

content: Keep those UAV's flying over Pakistan and Afghanistan!
